Method.name: OnPage
Method.Implementation: $$$VAR Set job = %session.SessionId Quit:$$$ISERR(..validaSessao()) $$$OK Set method = $Get(%request.Data("method",1)) Xecute "do .."_method_"()" Quit $$$OK

Method.name: validaSessao
getDados

Do arrayRetorno.%ToJSON() Return $$$OK
